title: Blood moon yasuo skin is  a bit too light on the colors..
body: is it just me or the blood moon yasuo skin tornado effect is really hard to see... im having a lot of trouble seeing it and fighting yasuo players with that skin... i find the effect of the tornado too light and i cant see it very well also it hard for me to tell when he has a tornado up when he has that skin.. is there something i change in the settings to make it a bit more visible for me thanks.

replies.body: welcome to the league of legends

Your best bet would probably be upping the contrast on your monitor a bit. If your contrast is too low warm colours and colours similar to their background can get hard to see pretty quickly. Even pushing it a few points should help without really noticeably changing your display.
